substats: Effect RES until 30% (if running Broken Keel) > Speed > ATK% > Break Effect > HP% = DEF%
traces_priority: Cleansing Revival > Sanctified > Through the Valley

conesNew.notes: Luocha's best in slot Light Cone that gives him everything he wants - ATK%, Energy Regen and a Speed buff to whole team on top of that.
Advance Forward is a very strong mechanic that translates into more actions taken over the course of the battle - especially that Healers want to use their Basic most of the time.
Allows Luocha to Ult after (Auto)Skill + 2x Basic, which improves his field uptime. Can also be used at Superimposition 2 with vonwacq to achieve the same results.
While Luocha's heals scale off ATK this cone gives him a lot of raw stats and Outgoing Healing boost - and the Max HP makes him tankier on top of that.
Gives Luocha a second line of protection against CC, and also allows him to resist debuffs. Helps with Broken Keel requirements and allows Luocha to stack Effect RES for stronger healing.
